column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////I've been to Common Bond several times now
column2: and have yet to be disappointed! The ambiance is fun
column6: the food! I've come for lunch each time
column7: and have been intrigued by the inventive ways they prepare each dish
column8: and delighted by the results. I had the charred romaine salad today
column9: and I savored each bite. Then
column10: it was time for dessert - magnificent pastries! The challenge is choosing just one.
